com.tilab.gal
Class LocalNodeAdapter

java.lang.Object
  com.tilab.gal.LocalNodeAdapter
Direct Known Subclasses:
AndroidLocalNodeAdapter
public abstract class LocalNodeAdapter
extends java.lang.Object

This static class encapsulates the Spine Manager's interface to lower level sensor interfaces. The LocalNodeAdapter is dynamically loaded based on system property files (So a different LocalNodeAdapter is loaded based on the platfor specified in SPINETestApp.properties

Author:
scott.coleman
